links.name: CS/Tear Gas
links.description: Contact, Inhalation vector. 3 seconds. Power 8. Disorientation, Nausea, Stun damage. Irritant effect to eyes skins and mucus membranes.

links.name: Gamma-Scopolamine
links.description: Injection vector, immediate. Power 12. Paralysis, truth serum, reduces willpower by 3. Nasty agent from night-shade, neuromuscular blocking that paralyzes target

links.name: Narcojet
links.description: Injection vector, immediate. Power 15. Stun damage. Tranquilizer.

links.name: Nausea Gas
links.description: Inhalation vector, 9 seconds, power 9. Disorientation, Nausea. Riot control agent. Ineret after two minutes.

links.name: Seven-7
links.description: Contact, inhalation vector. 3 seconds. Penetration -2. Physical damage, disorientation, nausea. Colorless and odorless gass. Inerent after 10 minutes of exposure.

links.name: Neuro-Stun VIII
links.description: Contact, Inhalation vector, 3 seconds. Stun damage. Colorless and odorless knockout gas. Inert after ten minutes.

links.name: Neuro-Stun IX
links.description: 3 seconds. Contact, inhalation vector. Power 15, disorientation, stun damage. Inert after one minute.

links.name: Neuro-Stun X
links.description: Contact, inhalation vector. 3 seconds. Power 15. -2 AP. Stun Damage. Inert after one minute. Colorless and odorless.
